channel.title: Charge spell
channel.description: We have the charge spell so that the animation works but it does not actually charge the god spells. Does anyone have the code who does not mind sharing it with the rest of the community?

item.title: Charge spell
item.dc:creator: @Officer-Ahole Officer-Ahole
item.description:
@Officer-Ahole wrote:

[quote=“snoopy89, post:7, topic:327031”][quote author=Officer-Ahole link=topic=423442.msg3111846#msg3111846 date=1264609468]

Kryptix actually knows java. He’s quite well at what he’s been doing and I’m actually quite fond of him just being a player on PP2P and then wanting to make his own server and learn more than half of the people in this ENTIRE community within 3 months.

Even a baby knows java but he still can’t write it, you better stop licking hes but you don’t get anything from it.

you do not know how to program in java either. why are you on his case?

@kryptix - you don’t know jack squat. i still see the denial in your posts which makes me believe you don’t know what you’re doing.
[/quote]

Do i have to know c++ to command other people? Don’t think so and peobably you don’t know shit to so what have you to say here?[/quote]

oh great, 'nother mopar-moron.

yes, otherwise it would be pretty idiotic of you to do so. there is no reasonable explanation why you should tell someone that they cannot program, when you in fact cannot either. also you have no idea who i am. you have no clue. why are you making such big assumptions over no evidence at all?

i’ve been a behind-the-scene developer off and on for about a year now. i’m pretty confident that i’m more knowledgeable with java than you are. so to be blunt, you can throw that “you probably you don’t know shit” comment out the window, because that shit wont fly with me.

Read full topic

item.title: Charge spell
item.dc:creator: @darscape darscape
item.description:
@darscape wrote:

snoopy89:

Even a baby knows java but he still can’t write it, you better stop licking hes but you don’t get anything from it.

LOL MY EYES ARE BLEEDING!

I went through xEnt’s point server source but

[code] /**
*
* Weak god spell calculation, cbf with formulae’s -xEnt
* @return returns the selected god spell damage
*/

/*public static int godSpellDamage (int spellid, Player player) {
	
	int chargedamage;
	int maxgodspelldamage;
	int failrate;
	int accuracy;
	int finaldamage;
	int rand;
	int high;
	int low;
	int luck;

	
	if (player.isCharged()) {
		chargedamage = 12;
		accuracy = 5;
		
		
	} else {
		chargedamage = 0;
		accuracy = 0;
	}
	// Guthix Damage, strong but not as accurate
	if (spellid == 33) {
		maxgodspelldamage = 14;
		failrate = 28;
		// Saradomin Damage, weak, but accurate.
	} else if (spellid == 34) {
		maxgodspelldamage = 10;
		failrate = 22;
		// Zamorak Damage, average damage, average accuracy
	} else {
		maxgodspelldamage = 12 + chargedamage;
		failrate = 25 - accuracy;
}
	
	rand = (int)(100.0 * Math.random()) + 1;
	
	if (rand <= failrate) {
		return 0;
	}

	
	luck = (int)(Math.random()* 3);
	
	if (luck == 1) {
		low = maxgodspelldamage / 2;
		finaldamage = (int)(Math.random()* maxgodspelldamage);
	} else {
		high = maxgodspelldamage / 2;
		finaldamage = (int)(Math.random() * high + 4);
		finaldamage = finaldamage + 10;		
	}

	return finaldamage;

}*/[/code]

Read full topic
